name: Perspectrum
description: Players take the role of the Tall Stranger, a being who has awakened with the power to use ancient fountains to change the elements of the world. The stranger must use spirit fragments scattered throughout the various levels to bring the mountain back to life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Dual core 2GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 210 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Dual core 3GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 210 MB available space
